results.webTitle: Tackling racism and working-class insults | Letters

fields.trailText: Letters: I deplore racism, but I equally deplore the pillorying of the working class, which Evertonians endure at so many matches

results.webTitle: A rocky approach to Gibraltar’s sovereignty | Letters

fields.trailText: Letters: The Spanish government could be persuaded to support an illegal war, but it was never going to accept a deal over Gibraltar that did not lead to full Spanish sovereignty

results.webTitle: Violence in Darfur today is much reduced | Letters

fields.trailText: Letters: Mr Cox entered Sudan illegally with the help of smugglers (who are invariably involved in drugs, weapons and human trafficking)

fields.trailText: Liberal Democrats write to Amber Rudd after British-born wife of Syrian president uses social media to support his regime

results.webTitle: US officials warn tensions with North Korea are 'coming to a head'

fields.trailText: US national security adviser pushes for peaceful resolution after country’s failed missile test, as Donald Trump hopes for Chinese intervention

results.webTitle: Hassan Rouhani faces tough re-election race as candidate list closes

fields.trailText: Iran’s moderate president will have to see off various heavyweight conservative critics of his nuclear deal with the west
